    • getFromAllUsers

      public User getFromAllUsers(String username)
      Retrieves a user by their username from the combined list of all users, artists, and hosts. This method searches through all users, artists, and hosts in the system and returns the first user found with the specified username. If no user is found with the given username, the method returns null. This method uses Java Streams to efficiently search across multiple collections.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A User object if a user with the specified username is found, otherwise null

    • createPlaylist

      public boolean createPlaylist(String playlistName, String username)
      Creates a new playlist with the given name and associates it with a user.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - The name of the playlist to create.
      username - The username of the user who owns the playlist.
      Returns:
      True if the playlist is successfully created, false if a playlist with the same name already exists.

    • returnPlaylistWithName

      public Playlist returnPlaylistWithName(String playlistName)
      Retrieves a Playlist object with the specified name from the library's collection of playlists.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - The name of the playlist to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Playlist object with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • searchSongInPlaylist

      public Song searchSongInPlaylist(String songName, Playlist playlist)
      Searches for a song with the specified name within a given playlist.
      Parameters:
      songName - The name of the song to search for.
      playlist - The playlist in which to search for the song.
      Returns:
      The Song object with the specified name if found in the playlist, or null if not found or if the provided playlist is null.

    • decideAddRemove

      public boolean decideAddRemove(Integer playlistID, Song song, String username)
      Decides whether to add or remove a song from a user's playlist based on the song's presence.
      Parameters:
      playlistID - The ID of the playlist within the user's owned playlists.
      song - The song to add or remove from the playlist.
      username - The username of the user who owns the playlist.
      Returns:
      True if the song was added to the playlist, false if the song was removed from the playlist.

    • resetInstance

      public static void resetInstance()
      Resets the singleton instance of the Library class, allowing for the creation of a new instance. This method is typically used for cleanup and resetting the library instance between tests or when needed.

    • hasAlbumWithGivenName

      public boolean hasAlbumWithGivenName(String username, String albumName)
      Retrieves a list of all playlists with the given owner name from the library.
      Parameters:
      username - The name of the owner to search for.
      albumName - The name of the album to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of all matching playlists in the library.

    • hasPodcastWithGivenName

      public boolean hasPodcastWithGivenName(String username, String podcastName)
      Checks if a user with a given username owns a podcast with a specific name. This method iterates through all podcasts and checks if there is a podcast owned by the specified user with the given podcast name. It returns true if such a podcast is found, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user who might own the podcast.
      podcastName - The name of the podcast to search for.
      Returns:
      true if a podcast with the given name and owned by the specified user exists, false otherwise.

    • getAlbumOfUserWithName

      public Album getAlbumOfUserWithName(String artistsName, String albumName)
      Retrieves a list of all albums with the given owner name from the library.
      Parameters:
      artistsName - The name of the owner to search for.
      albumName - The name of the album to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of all matching playlists in the library.

    • getPodcastOfHostWithName

      public Podcast getPodcastOfHostWithName(String hostName, String podcastName)
      Retrieves a list of all podcasts with the given owner name from the library.
      Parameters:
      hostName - The name of the owner to search for.
      podcastName - The name of the podcast to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of all matching podcasts in the library.

    • decideDeleteAlbum

      public boolean decideDeleteAlbum(Album album)
      Determines whether an album can be deleted based on its usage by users and its inclusion in playlists. This method checks two conditions to decide whether an album should be deleted: 1. If any user's player is currently loaded with content that contains the album, indicating that the album is in use. 2. If any of the songs from the album are included in any playlists. If either condition is met, the album should not be deleted.
      Parameters:
      album - The album to be evaluated for deletion.
      Returns:
      true if the album is currently in use and should not be deleted, false otherwise.

    • decideDeletePodcast

      public boolean decideDeletePodcast(Podcast podcast)
      Determines whether a podcast can be deleted based on its usage by users. This method checks if the podcast is currently loaded in any user's player, indicating that it is in use. If the podcast is in use, it should not be deleted.
      Parameters:
      podcast - The podcast to be evaluated for deletion.
      Returns:
      true if the podcast is currently in use and should not be deleted, false otherwise.
